args.question: Prepare the data to show the age of the youngest player per position for plotting.

xmode.name: data_preparation

xmode.content:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Data
positions = ['', 'Center', 'Center Power forward', 'Center power forward', 'Center, power forward', 'Centre', 'Centre power forward', 'Guard', 'Guard Small forward', 'Point guard', 'Point guard Shooting guard', 'Point guard shooting guard', 'Power forward', 'Power forward Center', 'Power forward Small forward', 'Power forward center', 'Power forward centre', 'Power forward small forward', 'Shooting guard', 'Shooting guard Point guard', 'Shooting guard Small forward', 'Shooting guard point guard', 'Shooting guard small forward', 'Small forward', 'Small forward Power forward', 'Small forward Shooting guard', 'Small forward power forward', 'Small forward shooting guard']
ages = [39, 28, 28, 29, 39, 44, 34, 37, 34, 28, 29, 31, 30, 30, 31, 28, 34, 29, 30, 31, 29, 29, 29, 28, 29, 31, 30, 30]

# Plot
plt.figure(figsize=(12, 8))
plt.barh(positions, ages, color='skyblue')
plt.xlabel('Age')
plt.title('Age of the Youngest Player per Position')
plt.gca().invert_yaxis()  # Invert y-axis to have the youngest age at the top
plt.tight_layout()

# Save the plot
plt.savefig('/home/ubuntu/workspace/XMODE/Rotowire/experiments/log/4/youngest_player_per_position.png')
plt.close()
